description.@en: A glowing light mends broken hearts and cures exhaustion.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch may move two steps up the Peril Condition Track positively. A Character may only gain the benefit of this Magick once per day.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but instead move three steps up the Peril Condition Track positively.

criticalFailure.@en: A nebulous, purple light emits from your hands as you touch the intended. They immediately suffer [[/roll 2D10+2]] physical Peril.

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
